alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 3:15PM MDT until April 21 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following county, Meagher. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 314 PM MDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... White Sulphur Springs, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Checkerboard, Lennep, Ringling, Fort Logan, Martinsdale and Fort Logan On The Smith River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
